alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 2:34AM PDT until April 04 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts between 50 to 60 mph expected. The strongest wind gusts are expected over exposed peaks and ridges. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. In Washington, Willapa Hills. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon
